= HOW TO control size and style of capthca with CSS? =

Note.

Joomla Captcha 3.0 has one html code for all modules and components!

User guide coming soon


Just insert next fragment into your template css file (templates/ja_purity/css/template.css or other).

for hide help string with css:

{{{
/* Joomla Captcha */
#captchahelplink {
	visibility: hidden;
}
}}}

for set picture size 90x40px with css ([http://www.harita-cat.com/ see sample]):

{{{
#captchaimage img {
	width: 90px;
	height: 40px;
}
}}}
